column4: My system will no longer boot into anything! can anyone help please?
I can see grub. Then system hangs when starting. Can't boot into live CD just blankscreen
did you install a new OS on this machine?
No it has been working for months, just shutdown as normal yesterday.
when you boot, can you confirm that even though your monitor is blank, your machine (like hard disk) is still running?
As far as I can tell. I can see it in BIOS and it will list options in Grub
no i mean, after the grub menu, can you still hear your machine working?
As far as I can tell. Do you want me to take it apart?
if after you select an option in the grub menu, nothing is displayed on the screen even though your machine is running, then it means that you have a graphics card problem
can you boot into recovery mode and select the failsafex graphics mode
If for example I press esc and then select 10.04 LTS 2.6.32-28-generic (recovery mode) it starts loading and then hangs after NET: Registered protocol family 1
do you see any error message?
Some iomem range could not be reserved messages. It gets past those. Registers protocal family 2, then family 1 (no errors) then stops
Memtest86 does not report any errors.
those unkown range error messages, maybe related to memory even though memtest didn't report anything. can you remove your RAM sticks and reset them?
Yes OK - give me a few mins..
Thany you so much :-) It's working now. You are a star!!
